name: Dog Poker Night
effect: Once per turn, each player may flip a coin for each Electrike, Entei, Growlithe, Houndoor, Lillipup, Poochyena, Raikou, Riolu, Rockruff, Snubbull, Suicune, Zacian, Zamazenta, or Zorua, or any Pokemon that evolves from them that they have in play. If you get 2 or more heads, search your deck for a card, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
